name: Yonah Aviv
headline: Senior Student at TanenbaumCHAT, Freelance Software Developer, Coding Tutor
summary: I am a senior high school student with a deep passion and curiosity for computer science and technology. I am a self‑taught computer programmer with experience in web development and artificial intelligence(including natural language processing). Currently, I am working on using AI to help students for whom it isn’t easy to start written assignments.

projects.title: Essay Writer Bot
projects.description: Artifical Intelligence essay writer that uses OpenAI’s GPT‑3 to write essays for academic and non‑academic purposes. For obvious reasons, I have not made this available publicly. However there is a link to a demo website.

projects.title: My Portfolio Site
projects.description: My personal portfolio site with google doc content management system using ArchieML.

projects.title: Svelte Portfolio with GitHub API
projects.description: Quick and simple svelte portfolio web app that automatically fetches your github repos and displays them as projects in a responsive grid. Made for a workshop I hosted.

projects.title: Flask Svelte Heroku starter template
projects.description: Flask with Svelte (single page application) frontend starter template , with heroku deployment made easy(no docker)

projects.title: Flask Svelte Heroku starter template
projects.description: Flask with Svelte (single page application) frontend starter template , with heroku deployment made easy(no docker)

projects.title: QuickSum
projects.description: Paste a body of text (i.e., an article, essay, etc.) and QuickSum will generate a summary of it for you. Coded using Svelte

projects.title: Client Portfolio Website
projects.description: incomplete portfolio website coded by Yonah Aviv for Harry James potter. This project was not finished because they did not need it anymore.

projects.title: Dystopian Literature Blog
projects.description: Blog on various dystopian texts for the final summative task in my grade 11 English class

projects.title: Pydash
projects.description: Python implementation of Geometry dash, a rhythm based platformer game, using Pygame, an interactive graphics library for python. Made for a computer science course

projects.title: FragmentQR
projects.description: Browser extension that allows for the generation of QR codes linking to arbitrary text on a page.
